intro: Drift. Customize. Dominate. Become the Ultimate Drift Master.
description:
The ultimate drifting experience awaits in Tenshokyo : Japan Drift. Take control of legendary cars and master the streets with precision and style. Choose from 21 high-performance cars from Japan, Europe, and the USA, and customize every detail to fit your driving style. Upgrade turbo, traction, brake power, engine performance, steering angle, and max speed to dominate the competition.

Challenge Yourself in 40+ Thrilling Missions
Compete in a variety of drift challenges, earning experience points as you rack up massive drift scores. Keep your drift going without crashing or stopping to prove your skills and climb the ranks.

Real Drifting Physics & Intense Action
Feel the power of precise car control with realistic drifting mechanics. Whether on city streets or technical courses, every drift brings the thrill of pushing your limits. Become the ultimate drift master and claim your spot as a legend.

This game was previously released under other the name, but it is now available as "Tenshokyo: Japan Drift".
If you have already purchased "Japanese Drift Master", please note that this is the same game. Be careful not to buy it again by mistake.
